import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { ActivatedRoute } from '@angular/router'; @Component({ selector: 'app-employeeinfo', templateUrl: './employeeinfo.component.html', styleUrls: ['./employeeinfo.component.css'] }) export class EmployeeinfoComponent { constructor(private route: ActivatedRoute){} getEmployee: {id: number, name: string} ngOnInit(){ this.getEmployee = { id: this.route.snapshot.params['id'], name: this.route.snapshot.params['name'] } } } Employee Information
